body.value:
Dear $SOLICITORNAME,
Thank you for contacting Project Labdoo.
In order to understand if we can help your project, we need first to identify possible travelers who will go from any of the Labdoo hubs to $SOLICITORCOUNTRYNAME. Currently, we have 72 hubs across the globe.
Do you know anyone who is traveling from your area to any of the Labdoo hubs in the following weeks or months? Here is the list of Labdoo hubs: http://www.labdoo.org/hubs
If so, we can explore ways in which we can try to bring laptops to your project. Looking forward to hearing from you. Thank you and best wishes,
$MYNAME Labdoo Team
